GetBulkDataPayload ()

 GetBulkDataPayload returns the raw bulkdata memory in compressed form, not decompressed (use LockMip or GetMipData for that) the shared buffer should be treated as read only! to modify, make a copy and call Init() on the source with the changed copy

bool

UpdateChannelLinearMinMax ()

 UpdateChannelLinearMinMax runs FImageCore::ComputeChannelLinearMinMax on all blocks and layers (but only mip0), returns false if the source was unable to be locked and leaves the channel minmax as unknown.
bool

UpdateChannelMinMaxFromIncomingTextureData ( FMemoryView InNewTextureData
)

 As per UpdateChannelLinearMinMax(), except acts on incoming new data rather than locking existing mips.
void

UseHashAsGuid ()

 Uses a hash as the GUID, useful to prevent creating new GUIDs on load for legacy assets.

  Type Name Description
FMipAllocation    
FMipData Structure that encapsulates the decompressed texture data and can be accessed per mip  
FMipLock FMipLock to encapsulate a locked mip - acquires the lock in construct and unlocks in destruct.
